eventName: Such is the Joy of Our Reunion
storyInfo: Blaze is determined to take part in the Feast of a Hundred Delicacies Chef Selection Competition, so the Young Chef starts giving her special culinary training. Unfortunately, her horrid cooking skills give him a real headache. Meanwhile, Xingzhu patiently accompanies Blaze and gives her advice. A bowl of longevity noodles brings back a lot of memories for the two.

attributes.text: Oh, you came to the library too. What a coincidence.
Hello, Yu. Are you here to look up some case files?
Just grabbing some books to put under my pillow. I haven't been sleeping well lately—maybe some reading will help.
How I envy the life of a student. Their brains are filled with books, not worries.
Surely you're joking.
I'm not joking at all. Investigating these sordid cases for the Judicial Review Office every day is bound to make one feel sick.
They say the Baizao Academy library is the cleanest and purest place in the world, where only wise men and sages dwell. So I'll sit here for a while and purify my soul.
Did you use to study here at the Academy too, Gu Quan?
That was many years ago...
I still haven't achieved anything yet, academically, since I graduated from here. I feel unworthy of the academy's prestige.
But I was fortunate to meet a great teacher here, and that experience will benefit me for the rest of my life.
Who is this teacher you speak of?
...No longer with us.
Then why did you come here today? To borrow books?
I'm here to look up some case files...
The Ministry of Rites is preparing for a grand celebration, and we need to refer to some old rituals.
Hah...
I'm a deputy minister for the Judicial Review Office. Do you take me for blind, or merely illiterate?
That thing you have in your hand is clearly the case file from fifteen years ago, when the Grand Preceptor committed treason!
You know that file is top secret, right? You really have some gall!
I... have nothing to hide.
I am indeed looking for materials related to that old case. I think there may be more to it than we realize. If you think I'm doing anything illegal, then by all means, have me arrested.
What are you blabbering about? Did I say I was going to arrest you? I was only saying...
that it's quite a coincidence, because I'm also very interested in that case.

attributes.content: I learned a lot from our debate today. However, I still maintain my own views about the new reforms...
attributes.name: Diligent Student

attributes.content: I'll have to do more research on this.
attributes.name: Diligent Student

attributes.content: It's fine. This campus is plenty large enough to accommodate a wealth of different ideas. If my arguments have not convinced you, then you should not force yourself to agree with me just because I'm a teacher.
attributes.name: Baizao Lecturer

attributes.content: The students of this academy must focus on real world issues, instead of getting lost in theoretical or ideological musings.
attributes.name: Baizao Lecturer

attributes.content: Duoxie.
attributes.name: Diligent Student

attributes.content: A clock hangs on the top of the ancient building, the minute hand ticking as the shadow of sunlight moves slowly. The bell rings, and soon, students start pouring out of their classrooms.
A lone figure moves against the tide. The guards fail to notice the unfamiliar face amidst the crowd.
Good day. Do you need some help?
attributes.name: Cautious Student

attributes.content: Hello, how do I get to the archives where the students' files are stored?
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: You mean the registrar? What do you want with those files?
attributes.name: Cautious Student

attributes.content: I'm a new assistant lecturer. The professor wants me to organize the graduates' files.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: That's odd...
attributes.name: Cautious Student

attributes.content: Which professor?
attributes.name: Cautious Student

attributes.content: Professor Jing. She teaches military theory at the college affiliated to the Ministry of War.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: She's teaching classes all day today, so she asked me to do this errand for her.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Oh!
attributes.name: Cautious Student

attributes.content: What's wrong?
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Go straight down here, pass the main building, turn right, and you'll see the Bingshen building. That's it.
attributes.name: Cautious Student

attributes.content: You'd better get going... Trust me, you don't want to keep her waiting.
attributes.name: Cautious Student

attributes.content: ...Duoxie.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Ahem, the first rule of any restaurant is that once you enter the kitchen, the chef's words are law.
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: If you want to win the contest and meet Mo Bufu, you must follow my instructions to the letter. Do you understand?
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: Didn't we agree to split the prize money seventy-thirty? Why are you acting like I owe you a favor?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Okay Okay. Enough of that. Didn't you say you wanted to learn a few new recipes anyway?
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: Have you changed your mind?
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: No. I want to do this, but I'm no Rhodes Island five-star chef. This competition sounds too difficult for an amateur like me.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Why don't you go instead?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I am the head chef of Savors at Yu's. Participating in this kind of competition would be sullying my good name.
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: I'm giving you an opportunity here. As my apprentice, you can go show your skills, and wipe that arrogant smirk off Mo Bufu's face.
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: Wouldn't Xingzhu be a better choice? She's a foodie, you know.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I'm afraid that, as The Wandering Foodie, I'm too well known. It would be inappropriate for me to participate in a food competition.
attributes.name: Xingzhu

attributes.content: Enough chitchat. First thing's first. To get you ready for this competition, let me tell you a little about Ding Feng Lou.
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: I've been hearing about this place since I first set foot in Baizao. What's so special about it?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Remember I told you about the Four Great Restaurants of Baizao, corresponding to the four main branches of Yanese Cuisine, that is, North, South, East, and West?
attributes.name: Xingzhu

attributes.content: About four hundred years ago, several chefs arrived in Baizao. They each set up their own restaurants and culinary sects. This marked the founding of the four main branches of Yanese cuisine.
attributes.name: Xingzhu

attributes.content: It was the first head chef of Ding Feng Lou who promoted the founding in the first place.
attributes.name: Xingzhu

attributes.content: The legendary chef's name has been lost to history. He was the founder of Northern Cuisine, but was also proficient in the other three styles.
attributes.name: Xingzhu

attributes.content: The other three chefs were only invited to Baizao after they lost to the Northern Chef in a cooking competition.
attributes.name: Xingzhu

attributes.content: With such a storied history, Ding Feng Lou outshined the other three restaurants and became known as the 'number one restaurant in Baizao.'
attributes.name: Xingzhu

attributes.content: Who's teaching this class, you or me?
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: Oh. My apologies!
attributes.name: Xingzhu

attributes.content: Hmph, of course, what she said is pretty much accurate. The only thing I'll add is that eventually, the Four Great Restaurants of Baizao started fighting with each other for fame and glory. These squabbles continue to this day, and they're really quite annoying.
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: I thought Baizao was a place where all these great chefs could learn from each other. If I had known there was going to be all this infighting, I would not have gone...
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: Not have gone where?
attributes.name: Blaze
Young Chef
attributes.content: Ahem...!

attributes.name: Young Chef
attributes.content: In any case, what you need to know is that, as the most famous restaurant in Baizao, Ding Feng Lou, and its Chef Selection Competition, has extremely high standards.

Ding Feng Lou has not taken on any new disciples in many years. The only reason they're hosting this competition now is because they suddenly got short-handed right when they needed to start preparing for the Feast of a Hundred Delicacies.
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: But I've also heard that Chef Mo is advancing in age and still hasn't found an apprentice to take over the business...
attributes.name: Xingzhu

attributes.content: The format of the competition is different each time, but there is one requirement that stays constant: each chef has to showcase their best dish.
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: Wait a second...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: If the competition is really that difficult, how can I ever hope to win?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Logic would dictate that an amateur chef with absolutely no culinary experience would have little hope of winning.
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: However, you have me in your corner. I can teach you a recipe that is easy to cook and is perfect for the occasion—
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: Longevity noodles.
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: Longevity noodles? Why would they serve longevity noodles at the Feast of a Hundred Delicacies?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: The reigning True Lung's birthday just happens to coincide with the Mid-Autumn Festival, so every year, they serve longevity noodles at the Feast.
attributes.name: Xingzhu

attributes.content: But it's such a simple dish. Is it really appropriate for a major competition like this?
attributes.name: Xingzhu

attributes.content: Who told you that simple dishes can't show great skills?
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: Just watch and learn.
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: What's that smell...? That smells wonderful! What is it?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Hm-hmm—
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: What do you think?
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: It's like magic! You really only used the ingredients you showed us before? Nothing else?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Fresh shellbeast meat, mushrooms, scallions, bok choy...
attributes.name: Xingzhu

attributes.content: It's a simple recipe with basic ingredients, but the result is truly amazing.
attributes.name: Xingzhu

attributes.content: Sometimes, the true skill of a chef hides in unseen places. There's more to this bowl of noodles than meets the eye.
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: Another chef can use these exact same ingredients, but if the ratios, the heat, or the cooking time vary just a little bit, it'll taste completely different. Do you know how long I spent perfecting this recipe?
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: Don't just stand there. Dig in!
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: Wow.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I take back any criticism I had of your food!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: You just inhaled it! Did you even taste the flavor?!
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: If Blaze can actually replicate that taste, maybe she really can meet Chef Mo.
attributes.name: Xingzhu

attributes.content: But are you really up to the task, Blaze?
attributes.name: Xingzhu

attributes.content: Figuring out the secret to this recipe would be difficult indeed. But simply following its steps should not be too much trouble.
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: Have you ever cooked anything before?
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: Of course!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Ah. That's good then.
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: Now I'll give you the recipe and explain every step for you. Follow them exactly, and you'll be fine.
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: Great! I'll study hard! I won't disappoint you!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Didn't you say you knew how to cook?!
attributes.name: Angry Voice

attributes.content: The instant noodles are already pre-made! How should I know how to knead flour into dough?
attributes.name: Aggrieved Voice

attributes.content: You really are a hopeless case!
attributes.name: Angry Voice

attributes.content: You haven't really even taught me anything yet...
attributes.name: Aggrieved Voice

attributes.content: How can I teach you anything? You managed to break three bowls just while kneading the dough! I can't risk you breaking anything else here!
attributes.name: Angry Voice

attributes.content: Aiyo... aiyo...
attributes.name: Jiang

attributes.content: Be careful... These bowls are expensive... We can't afford to buy new ones—
attributes.name: Jiang

attributes.content: *sigh*
attributes.name: Jiang

attributes.text: Search\tGu Quan
\nFilter\tReturned from Victoria
<color=#ff0000>\n\nNo results</color>

attributes.content: Why are there no records at all?
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.text: Search\tGu Quan
\nFilter\tEnrolled in 1076
<color=#ff0000>\n\nNo results</color>
Search\tGu Quan
\nFilter\tMinistry of Rites
<color=#ff0000>\n\nNo results</color>

attributes.content: What is going on?
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Gu Quan, an ethnic Yanese born and raised in Victoria, returned to Yan in 1074. In 1076, he was admitted to Baizao Academy. After completing his studies, he joined the Ministry of Rites...
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: These are the only records left for the deceased in that case.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: They should have files for all mandarins who graduated from the Imperial Academy and went to work in the Six Ministries of the court… but why can't I find him in the system?
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Gu Quan, what did you...?
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Professor, I was just trying to confirm that with you. I didn't mean to ask you to come here in person...
attributes.name: Voice Outside the Door

attributes.content: She said she's a new assistant professor? Why haven't I ever heard of her before?
attributes.name: Stern Voice

attributes.content: The person who came here seemed to know you very well, so I didn't...
attributes.name: Voice Outside the Door

attributes.content: How many times have I told you? The Academy's personnel files are confidential! Keep that in mind!
attributes.name: Stern Voice

attributes.content: Forget it. I'll go handle this myself.
attributes.name: Stern Voice

attributes.content: Oh no!
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Hmm?
attributes.name: Stern Professor

attributes.content: The room is empty and the documents on the desk are still where they were, without any signs of having been moved.
Qingyan, you're a bit too old to be playing hide-and-seek, aren't you?
attributes.name: Stern Professor

attributes.content: J-Jing...
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Has the Judicial Review Office come to our school to apprehend some culprit?
attributes.name: Stern Professor

attributes.content: The Office is investigating a case, so I've come here to collect a few old case files. Please, Jing... Professor Jing... Please cooperate.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Alright then. If you're here on official business, show me your official documentation.
attributes.name: Professor Jing

attributes.content: I rushed so quickly to get here that I left it back at my office.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Really? Well then I'll just place a call in to the head of the Office.
attributes.name: Professor Jing

attributes.content: Wait... wait a moment!
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Professor, are you okay?
attributes.name: Voice Outside the Door

attributes.content: Should I call security?
attributes.name: Voice Outside the Door

attributes.content: *sigh*
attributes.name: Professor Jing

attributes.content: (gives a pleading look)
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: No. I forgot that I asked some other professor here to collect some materials for me.
attributes.name: Professor Jing

attributes.content: I'm sorry for wasting your time.
attributes.name: Professor Jing

attributes.content: It's not a problem! Goodbye, professor!
attributes.name: Voice Outside the Door

attributes.content: Alright. Now it's just the two of us.
attributes.name: Professor Jing

attributes.content: Xie... Xiexie.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: *sigh* Qingyan...
attributes.name: Professor Jing

attributes.content: I have always thought that you were a well-mannered and trustworthy girl. Every time I mentioned you to Le, I told him to follow your example.
attributes.name: Professor Jing

attributes.content: And look at you now—What are you doing here? A deputy minister from the Judicial Review Office, sneaking around like this?
attributes.name: Professor Jing

attributes.content: I'm conducting an investigation...
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: What kind of case requires this secrecy? What kind of case can't go through the normal process?
attributes.name: Professor Jing

attributes.content: A cold case... the deceased was once a student at the Baizao Academy, but I just searched the personnel files and found no record of him.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: The Academy has a record of every student. This person you speak of, how do you know they once studied here?
attributes.name: Professor Jing

attributes.content: I saw it in the files at the Judicial Review Office.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: The Judicial Review Office collects its files directly from the Ministry of Rites. However, the Ministry's files do not match up with the Academy's. Someone made a mistake somewhere.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Is there a chance that someone altered the Academy's files?
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: How could that possibly have happened?
attributes.name: Professor Jing

attributes.content: The Academy is one of the Yanese government's most important talent pipelines. Once a student's information is entered into the system, it is archived under strict supervision.
attributes.name: Professor Jing

attributes.content: No one has the authority to modify this data, unless...
attributes.name: Professor Jing

attributes.content: Unless what...?
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: No. That's impossible.
attributes.name: Professor Jing

attributes.content: Enough of this nonsense. You'd better leave now.
attributes.name: Professor Jing

attributes.content: It's almost mealtime. Pretty soon, lots of students will be crowding these halls. If anyone else sees you here...
attributes.name: Professor Jing

attributes.content: Also, please don't go doing something like this again.
attributes.name: Professor Jing

attributes.content: Mealtime...
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: We need to go back to Baizao to investigate. Why are you looking at all these travel guides?
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: These places... I've seen them in my dad's letters.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Humble Garden, Virtue Bookstore... oh and when he was studying here, there was a Shangshu Diner near the main entrance. He said they have the best twice-cooked pork in town!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Now that I'm visiting Baizao, I want to visit all the places he mentioned to me.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Say, is there a restaurant near campus called the Shangshu Diner?
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Huh? You want Shangshu food?
attributes.name: Professor Jing

attributes.content: The place you're talking about closed more than thirty years ago. How would you possibly know about it?
attributes.name: Professor Jing

attributes.content: More than thirty years ago? Are you sure?
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Yes. It closed in 1065 when I was in school. How could I forget?
attributes.name: Professor Jing

attributes.content: Lots of students used to go eat there, because it was near campus and served tasty, affordable food.
attributes.name: Professor Jing

attributes.content: But then, in 1065, there was a terrible Catastrophe in Shangshu, and the restaurant owner had to return home to deal with the aftermath. The students even made donations to help with the rescue effort.
attributes.name: Professor Jing

attributes.content: A man who was born and raised in Victoria and did not come to Yan until 1074... how could he know about the place?
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Unless...
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Unless he had visited Yan before, or maybe he wasn't born and raised in Victoria after all? Maybe he was a native Yanese?
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: What are you mumbling about?
attributes.name: Professor Jing

attributes.content: If Gu Quan's Ministry of Rites records were modified, but he was indeed a student at the Academy, well then, there would definitely be something worth digging up in the Academy's files.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: What year was Blaze born? If we work back from there...
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Does this system have the records of students enrolled between 1052 and 1062?
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: You...
attributes.name: Professor Jing

attributes.content: Help me just this once. It's extremely important...
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Thousands of students graduate each year. You want to look through ten years of records at once? Do you know how long that will take?
attributes.name: Professor Jing

attributes.content: The person in question worked for the Ministry of Rites. He probably studied at an affiliated college. That may help narrow the search a bit.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: If the person you are looking for was not a high-ranking mandarin, you may want to start looking at files after 1055.
attributes.name: Professor Jing

attributes.content: That year, the Academy was restructured. It became a true public education institution, instead of just serving as a talent pipeline for the government. The enrollment figures shot up.
attributes.name: Professor Jing

attributes.content: I see... Duoxie!
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Go. You only have two hours.
attributes.name: Professor Jing

attributes.content: Found you...
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: ...Gu Sheng.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Male, born in Langyi in 1037, accepted into Baizao Academy in 1055. He was assigned to the Education Department administered by the Ministry of Rites... and was among the first batch of students to enroll after the school was restructured.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Top marks in all subjects... Wait. He didn't graduate?
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: This file was last updated in... 1062?
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: This is a missing persons file?
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: 'Gu Sheng, along with his wife and daughter, disappeared in 1062. Accordingly, this file has been sealed.'
So he was already a family man when he was in Baizao... and all three of them disappeared...
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: 1062... Is there something special about 1062?
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Blaze... I need to confirm something...
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: You were born in 1062, in Victoria, right?
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Yes. From as far back as I can remember, I lived in Victoria.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I asked you where you were born!
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: How am I supposed to remember that?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Gu Quan... Gu Sheng...
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Qingyan, your time is almost up. You should get going.
attributes.name: Professor Jing

attributes.content: What did he say?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: No good. The dough still won't do. Let's try again.
attributes.name: Xingzhu

attributes.content: But that's already my twentieth batch!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Don't worry, you have been practicing all day, and you're starting to iron out the issues with your technique. Success is not far away.
attributes.name: Xingzhu

attributes.content: I'm really sorry. You don't need to stay here with me through all this.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: It's not a problem!
attributes.name: Xingzhu

attributes.content: You've been helping me so much, I guess you must also be interested in the outcome of all of this, huh?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Alright. Just wait here a minute. This time I'm sure I'll do it, and I'll whip you up a big, nice bowl of noodles for dinner.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Did you... have something else you wanted to say to me just now?
attributes.name: Xingzhu

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: N-Never mind...
attributes.name: Xingzhu

attributes.content: To be fair, the recipe the Young Chef gave you was indeed simple enough. He probably didn't expect that your biggest difficulty would be kneading the dough.
attributes.name: Xingzhu

attributes.content: Look at you defending him!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I'm sorry...
attributes.name: Xingzhu

attributes.content: I'm doing all I can do. It's hard. When I work, my body temperature rises, and the dough starts to dry out in just a few seconds.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I add more water to the flour, and then more flour to the water, and then more flour and water... The dough that was originally the size of my fist is now almost as big as my head!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: The situation with your rising body temperature is certainly unique...
attributes.name: Xingzhu

attributes.content: Anyway, you need to think positively: so long as you learn to knead the dough, making the longevity noodles will be no problem at all!
attributes.name: Xingzhu

attributes.content: Speaking of which, for someone who has never cooked before, you certainly have some impressive knife skills.
attributes.name: Xingzhu

attributes.content: Well, back at Rhodes Island, elite operators like me perform surgery on ourselves in emergency situations.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I guess there's not much difference between using a scalpel and a kitchen knife, assuming you're not using it like the Young Chef does when he chops vegetables.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I can even use the skills I learned from stitching my own wounds to mend my own clothes.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I wouldn't have thought your job would be this dangerous.
attributes.name: Xingzhu

attributes.content: Hmph, not a big deal if you have the time to practice.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: The more I think about it, the angrier I get. Can't he just have more patience with me?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Hey! Look! I think you're getting the hang of it. The amount of force is just right. Keep it up!
attributes.name: Xingzhu

attributes.content: I... haven't even... had any dinner yet!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Hold onto that anger! Fold the dough over and continue kneading. Right. You can get even angrier if you want!
attributes.name: Xingzhu

attributes.content: No. I can't get any angrier... boy the noodles he makes sure are delicious!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I'm spent—
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Ugh... Why is cooking even more exhausting than combat training?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I understand this is really hard for you...
attributes.name: Xingzhu

attributes.content: I don't want to deal with that pipsqueak anymore! Can I be your apprentice instead? You're a gourmand. You must know how to cook, right?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Spare me the compliments... I am nothing close to him when it comes to cooking.
attributes.name: Xingzhu

attributes.content: And you know, it's funny that I've never actually eaten longevity noodles before.
attributes.name: Xingzhu

attributes.content: They are just noodles, right? You've tried so many different restaurants. How could you have never eaten longevity noodles before?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I've been to many restaurants that serve longevity noodles, but it only makes sense to eat them on your birthday!
attributes.name: Xingzhu

attributes.content: I celebrate every birthday at home. They don't allow me to go out on my birthday.
attributes.name: Xingzhu

attributes.content: Okay, but even if you celebrate your birthdays at home, your mom or dad never made you a bowl of longevity noodles?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Actually, I've never met my parents...
attributes.name: Xingzhu

attributes.content: Oh, I'm sorry...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Although I have never seen my parents, I still have other family members. Every year, on my birthday, my family holds a big banquet for me.
attributes.name: Xingzhu

attributes.content: At banquets like that, I don't think they care much about longevity noodles.
attributes.name: Xingzhu

attributes.content: However, I've always been a little afraid of birthdays...
attributes.name: Xingzhu

attributes.content: Isn't it nice that other people remember your birthday?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I can't really explain it. I always feel that every time I have a birthday party, I will be surrounded by a lot of people who want me to laugh, and also to cry.
attributes.name: Xingzhu

attributes.content: But it doesn't seem to matter whether I'm there or not...
attributes.name: Xingzhu

attributes.content: Enough talk about me. You're from Victoria. Do they eat longevity noodles there?
attributes.name: Xingzhu

attributes.content: I grew up in Victoria, but my parents are both Yanese, at least, by blood.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: When I was little, every year, on my birthday, my mom would make me a bowl of longevity noodles. The taste was nothing special. It was just regular old home cooking.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: After I left home and could no longer eat my mom's home cooking, I even forgot what it was like to celebrate a birthday.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: That is, until that night...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: The seasoning packet, the vegetable packet... and I'll add two sausages, hehe... why are the lights off in the cafeteria?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Hey! What are you guys doing here? You scared me!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Shhh, keep your voice down.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: It's late. What are you doing in the cafeteria at this hour?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Ace... why do you look all serious? There's not another urgent mission, is there?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: What are you holding there? Instant noodles?
attributes.name: Ace

attributes.content: I stayed too long at the training ground this afternoon and didn't have enough for dinner!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: What? Now that I'm an elite operator, I can't eat instant noodles anymore?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: The captain isn't scolding you for eating junk food. He's saying...
attributes.name: Touch

attributes.content: Today is your birthday, and you're eating instant noodles?
attributes.name: Touch

attributes.content: My birthday...?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: But didn't Dr. Kal'tsit say—
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: That's why I told you to lower your voice.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: So long as we don't make too much noise, even if she hears us, she'll pretend not to hear, yes?
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: I even suspect that she deliberately arranged for our fieldwork breaks to overlap, just so we could throw you a birthday party.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Think of it as her way of giving you a birthday blessing... even if it's hard to imagine.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Blaze, you are one of us, a part of Rhodes Island. You are not alone.
attributes.name: Touch

attributes.content: I... you... thank you all so much!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Alright. It's already midnight. Happy birthday, Blaze!
attributes.name: Ace

attributes.content: Happy birthday, Big Cat!
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: Happy Birthday.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Happy birthday! Also, Amiya isn't on the ship right now, but she asked me to pass on the birthday wishes. She hopes you stay happy and healthy!
attributes.name: Touch

attributes.content: Aww... Bunny...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: So, are you planning to come blow out the candles and cut the cake, or are you going back to your instant noodles?
attributes.name: Ace

attributes.content: That was the first time so many people celebrated my birthday with me. That bowl of instant noodles became my longevity noodles.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Everyone knew how much I wanted to have a birthday party, but that day, not a single person actually came out and said, 'I knew you wanted this'.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: They acted like... it was just another one of my many, many birthdays.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I liked the 'nothing special' feeling of it.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Now you're making me jealous...
attributes.name: Xingzhu

attributes.content: Oh, right! You said you've never had longevity noodles. Well, let me whip up some for you!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: But... you haven't even learned how to knead the dough yet...
attributes.name: Xingzhu

attributes.content: I don't know how to knead noodles, but I do know how to cook ready-made noodles. I'll go ask Jiang for some dried noodles that I can simply boil.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Wait... handmade noodles... ready-made noodles...
attributes.name: Xingzhu

attributes.content: Maybe it really will work, after all!
attributes.name: Xingzhu
